name: We analyse the requirements
detail: We build your ideal team based on your requirements, selecting members with the right skill sets. If necessary, we sign an NDA to guarantee full confidentiality.

name: We set up the team
detail: We assemble a dedicated, efficient team for your project, immersing them in your business to bring your idea to life.

name: You agree on the working process
detail: Review all processes and terms with the team, including reporting and work management, and establish a communication plan to track progress.

name: You start the project
detail: Start your project and enjoy smooth development. We handle the team's work environment, while you maintain control over management.
